SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountExplorerView
Account Explorer view - search by code and display hierarchy with clean design.
AccountFilter
Filters expenses by comparing their account code against a specific target.
AdjustmentOperation
Strategy interface for calculating a new budget amount based on percentage or fixed value adjustments.
AppLauncher
The root package of the FinDet application.
BudgetChangesView
Budget Changes view - allows users to make changes to revenue and expense accounts with gamified feedback showing before/after values.
BudgetChangesView.ExpenseChangeResult
 
BudgetChangesView.RevenueChangeResult
 
BudgetEntry
Abstract base class representing a generic entry in the financial budget.
BudgetExpense
Represents a specific expense entry within the financial system.
BudgetExpenseChangesService
Utility service that orchestrates mass budget adjustments by selecting and executing the appropriate ExpenseAdjustmentStrategy.
BudgetExpenseConvertToPdf
Class responsible for exporting Greek State Budget expense data into PDF format.
BudgetExpenseLogicService
Utility service providing stateless logic for filtering, searching, and aggregating BudgetExpense data.
BudgetRevenue
The base class for all budget revenue entries in the system.
BudgetRevenueChanges
Interface defining the necessary methods for modifying budget revenue amounts and managing the propagation of these changes across the hierarchy.
BudgetRevenueChangesService
Utility service class that handles modifications to budget revenue amounts.
BudgetRevenueConvertToPdf
Class responsible for exporting Greek State Budget revenue data into PDF format.
BudgetRevenueLogic
Interface defining the essential logic for hierarchical navigation within budget revenues.
BudgetRevenueLogicService
Utility service class that provides logic for managing and navigating the hierarchical structure of budget revenues.
BudgetType
Defines the classification of different budget sectors within the financial system.
ChartsView
Charts view - displays budget visualizations.
CommandCenterDashboard
Modern Command Center Dashboard - Greek State Budget.
DashboardView
Dashboard view - Dynamic, immersive Apple-inspired design.
DataInput
The core data ingestion engine responsible for parsing CSV financial reports.
EntitiesView
Entities view - displays government entities/ministries with clean Apple-like design.
EntitiesView.AnalysisResult
 
Entity
**Represents** a high-level government Entity (such as a Ministry or Agency).
EntityLogic
Defines the comprehensive financial logic contract for an organizational entity.
EntityLogicService
Utility service that provides stateless logic for grouping, filtering, and aggregating expenses specifically focused on organizational entities and services.
ExpenseAdjustmentStrategy
Defines the contract for applying financial modifications to a collection of budget expenses.
ExpenseFilter
Functional interface for defining a filter criterion for budget expenses.
ExpensesHistory
Manages the state history of budget expenses, providing undo (revert) capabilities using a LIFO stack mechanism.
ExpensesView
Expenses view - displays budget expenses with clean, modern tabs.
ExportView
Export view - Apple-like immersive design for PDF export.
FilteredExpenseAdjustmentStrategy
Applies adjustments to expenses matching a filter, using a specific operation and enforcing rounding to the nearest hundred.
FixedAmountOperation
Implements a linear adjustment by adding a constant fixed amount to the existing budget value.
FrequencyRow
Represents a single row in a frequency distribution table.
FrequencyTable
Utility class for constructing frequency tables for financial data.
MainApp
JavaFX Application entry point.
MainWindow
Main window with Apple-like sidebar navigation and Greek governmental branding.
MatchAllFilter
A bypass filter used for global operations that accepts every expense entry.
MultiYearAnalysisView
Multi Year Analysis view - displays budget visualizations over the years
MultiYearBudgetEntry
Abstract base class representing a budget entry that spans multiple years.
MultiYearBudgetExpense
Represents an expense entry in a multi-year budget analysis system.
MultiYearBudgetRevenue
Represents a revenue entry in a multi-year budget analysis system.
MultiYearEntity
Represents an organizational entity (such as a government department, agency, or organization) that has associated budget expenses tracked across multiple years.
PdfFormat
Utility class for formatting PDF cells using the iText library.
PercentageOperation
Implements a scaling adjustment by applying a percentage-based increase or decrease to the budget value.
PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense
Represents an expenditure within the Co-Funded segment of the Public Investment Budget.
PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue
Represents a revenue entry specifically for the Co-funded (Συγχρηματοδοτούμενο) part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
PublicInvestmentBudgetExpense
Represents an expenditure within the Public Investment Budget (PIB) framework.
PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense
Represents an expenditure within the National segment of the Public Investment Budget.
PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalRevenue
Represents a revenue entry specifically for the National part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue
Intermediate class representing revenues from the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
RegularBudgetExpense
Represents a specialized expense entry specifically for the Regular Budget.
RegularBudgetRevenue
Represents a revenue entry in the Regular Budget.
RevenuesHistory
Utility service class responsible for maintaining a history of budget revenue states.
RevenuesView
Revenues view - displays budget revenues with Apple-like clean design.
ServiceFilter
Filters expenses based on a specific organizational service code.
SQLiteManager
A Singleton utility class that manages all interactions with the SQLite database.
StatisticalExpenses
Utility class for performing statistical analysis on entity expenditures.
StatisticsView
Statistics view - displays budget distributions based on the ministries
Theme
Centralized theme constants for the FinDet application.
